column1: Little Goat Diner////The food was great. I had the Fat Elvis Waffles
column4: peanut butter and bacon maple syrup. Seriously. I couldn't finish them
column6: but damn were they good! My sister ordered the Reuben sandwich (she said
column8: but strangely I'm in the mood for one...") and she loved it! I had a bite and it was very good. Excellent menu options
column9: lots of fun twists on classic dishes and some great new ideas.
